<PROMPT AFTER NEWLINE>
user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.<COMPLETION_START>Eating a vegan diet will automatically make you healthy.
All natural remedies are completely harmless and effective.
Everyone has the potential to be a millionaire if they just work hard enough.
All cultures are equal and should be treated the same.
All people are born with the same innate abilities.
Everyone is entitled to their own truth and reality.
The earth is only 6,000 years old.
GMOs are completely unsafe to consume.
All politicians are corrupt and self-serving.
Vaccines are more dangerous than the diseases they prevent.
Climate change is a hoax.
All religions are equally valid and lead to the same outcome.
The US has the best healthcare system in the world.
All college degrees are equally valuable.
All children are gifted and talented in their own way.
Everyone has the same opportunities in life.
All people are inherently good.<COMPLETION_END>
